title: Introducing DIFFBRO - Your AI powered PEER REVIEWS in one command
description:
Unlock the future of code reviews with DIFFBRO - Your AI powered PEER REVIEWS in just one command. Dive into this ai devlog as we finish 3 critical features and officially launch diffbro, the AI peer review tool designed to supercharge your code reviews. 

Built using Python 3, poetry, chatgpt, and Aider, diffbro represents the pinnacle of our final AI devlog for py-diffbro. It's not just about reviewing; it's about preparing your code with an AI-charged examination BEFORE it ever meets a human eye.

Whether you're an indy developer or a full-time engineer striving for bug-free code, DIFFBRO is a great CLI tool to add to your toolbox. As highlighted in our previous diffbro AI devlogs, this tool is built with the latest AI engineering tools, empowering you to craft code and tackle challenges at record speeds. 

All tools have been listed below, waiting for you whenever you're ready to AI charge your engineering. So grab your favorite drink, kick back, and immerse yourself in this AI devlog. Don't forget, DIFFBRO is readily available on PIP, feel free to try it, hate it, love it, and give feedback. We're always looking to improve and make DIFFBRO the best, FREE, open source AI peer review tool. 

Remember to sub, like and code like you're in the future.

Try DIFFBRO: Your AI powered Peer Review Bro
github: https://github.com/disler/diffbro
pip: https://pypi.org/project/diffbro/
